text: Hell in a Cell was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on October 4, 2009 at the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey. It was the first Hell in a Cell event made by WWE. The name of the event was voted by fans from WWE's official website. Hell in a Cell was chosen over No Escape, Lock Up and Rage in a Cage. == Background == Hell in a Cell contained professional wrestling matches, with the main event matches being held in a Hell in a Cell match. The events involved wrestlers from all three brands (Raw, SmackDown and ECW). The wrestlers portrayed good guys, bad guys or tweeners (morally ambiguous characters) as they followed a series of events which lead to a wrestling match or a series of wrestling matches. ==Results== == Related pages == *List of WWE pay-per-view events == References == == Other websites == *Hell in a Cell official website *Hell in a Cell Matches Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:Newark, New Jersey Category:2009 in professional wrestling Category:2000s in New Jersey Category:2009 in the United States pl:Hell in a Cell 2009
title: Hell in a Cell (2009)
